column1: Smoque BBQ////The reason I have to ding Smoque is that our ribs were undercooked. We got both baby back and spare ribs
column2: and both needed more time in the smoker. It was a Sunday evening and it was very busy
column3: so I suspect they were pulling the ribs off early in order to feed the crowd. Nonetheless
column4: I was disheartened because I had heard so many rave reviews.
